amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. __. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to make an application under section 501 of the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act of 1978 (50 U.S.C. 1861) for an order requiring the production of library circulation records, library patron lists, book sales records, or book customer lists.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 524 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds for making application under FISA for an order requiring the production of library circulation records, library patron lists, book sales records, or book customer lists.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A087) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 231 (Roll no. 95).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A087) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 231 (Roll no. 95).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A087) offered by Mr. Nadler.
